languages.text: Напомнить солдатам, что Человечество способно противостоять даже самой страшной ксеносской угрозе, главное — найти в себе силы не поддаваться ей.

traits.locale_text: Напомнить солдатам, что человечество способно противостоять даже самой страшной ксеносской угрозе, главное — найти в себе силы не поддаваться ей.

languages.text: Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.
languages.original_text: Напомнить солдатам, что Человечество способно противостоять даже самой страшной ксеносской угрозе, главное — найти в себе силы не поддаваться ей.

traits.locale_text: Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength to not give in to it.
Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength to not give in to it.
Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.
Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.
Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.

languages.text: 提醒士兵，只要保持内心坚定，不要屈从于异形的力量，那即便是最可怕的异形也不是人类的对手。
languages.original_text: Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.

traits.locale_text: 提醒士兵，只要保持内心坚定，不要屈从于异形的力量，那即便是最可怕的异形也不是人类的对手。

languages.text: 兵士たちに、人類は最も恐ろしい異種族の脅威でさえも撃退する能力があることを思い出させる。ただし、異種族の脅威に屈しないという内なる強さを見出すことができればの話だ。
languages.original_text: Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.

traits.locale_text: 兵士たちに、人類は最も恐ろしい異種族の脅威でさえも撃退する能力があることを思い出させる。ただし、異種族の脅威に屈しないという内なる強さを見出すことができればの話だ。

languages.text: Recordar a los soldados que la Humanidad es capaz de luchar incluso contra la más terrible amenaza xenos, siempre que encuentre la fuerza interior para no rendirse.
languages.original_text: Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.

traits.locale_text: Recordar a los soldados que la Humanidad es capaz de luchar incluso contra la más terrible amenaza xenos, siempre que encuentre la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}fuerza{/g} interior para no rendirse.

languages.text: Die Soldaten daran erinnern, dass die Menschheit selbst die schrecklichsten Xenos-Gefahren abwehren kann, wenn sie nur die innere Stärke aufbringt, nicht nachzugeben.
languages.original_text: Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.

traits.locale_text: Die Soldaten daran erinnern, dass die Menschheit selbst die schrecklichsten Xenos-Gefahren abwehren kann, wenn sie nur die innere Stärke aufbringt, nicht nachzugeben.

languages.text: Rappeler aux soldats que l'humanité est capable de vaincre les pires menaces xénos, pour peu qu'elle trouve en elle la force de ne pas y céder.
languages.original_text: Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.

traits.locale_text: Rappeler aux soldats que l'humanité est capable de vaincre les pires menaces xénos, pour peu qu'elle trouve en elle la force de ne pas y céder.

languages.text: Zenolara boyun eğmeyecek içsel gücü kendilerinde bulmaları hâlinde İnsanlığın, en büyük tehditlere karşı bile yıkılmayacağını askerlere hatırlat.
languages.original_text: Remind the soldiers that Humankind is capable of fighting off even the most terrible xenos threat, provided they find the inner strength not to yield to it.
